dcterms:creator: Jure Leskovec
Deepayan Chakrabarti
Jon Kleinberg
Christos Faloutsos
Zoubin Ghahramani
dcterms:description: The synthetic network is constructed by Kronecker generator, which can generate networks that have common structural properties of real networks, i.e., heavy tails for both in- and out-degree distributions, small diameters. The parameter matrix is set to be [0.9; 0.5; 0.5; 0.1] and we retain the largest connected component as the final network, containing 1,086 nodes and 4,038 edges.
dcterms:title: Synthetic Data Set

dcterms:creator: Jing Zhang
Biao Liu
Jie Tang
Ting Chen
Juanzi Li
dcterms:description: The Sina Weibo data set used in this paper is from publicly available sources and reflects the following relationships between users. The following network contains 1.78 million users and 308 million following relationships in total. 300 thousand popular microblog retweet information cascades of these users are included.
dcterms:title: Sina Weibo Data Set
